# Mole Syntax Checker

 [Mole](https://github.com/davrodpin/mole)'s Github Action to check for syntax
errors in the source code.

## Environment Variables

  * `GO_VERSION`: The version of the Go compiler used to generate the reports
    (default: 1.11.5)

## Secrets

N/A

## Required Arguments

N/A

## Optional Arguments

N/A
